Articles.Content: Nothing special, but I think it would be kinda neat to have a small helmet camera during EVA - like the IVA cameras in pods - showing a close up of the kerbonauts face?

I wonder how many times first person EVA has been suggested.
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42608"]Oldest I could find so far[/URL] is almost two and a half years old. Edited November 25, 2015 by Tex_NL

[quote name='Tex_NL']I wonder how many times first person EVA has been suggested.
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42608"]Oldest I could find so far[/URL] is almost two and a half years old.[/QUOTE]

Different from what I meant but neat too. :D
